Vivian Fowler Memorial College For Girls bụ kọleji kwụụrụ onwe ya nke ụmụ nwanyị niile guzobere n'afọ 1991 site n'aka Chief Mrs
Leila Fowler na Naijiria.  Ọ dị na Ikeja nke obodo Lagos.
N'ịbụ nke dị na Surulere, Chief Mrs
guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na Jenụwarị 8,  afọ 1991
Leila Fowler A gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ aha nwa ya nwanyị nwụrụ anwụ. Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ meghere na 17, Bola Shadipe St, Surulere Lagos, mgbe e mesịrị ọ kwagara na No
4, Adedamole Ojomo Close, n'okporo ámá Bode Thomas, Surulere Lakes
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ wee kwaga ebe obibi ya na Jenụwarị afọ 2000, Ebe a dị na Plot 5, Balogun Street, Billingsway Oregun, Ikeja Lagos Steeti.

Agụmakwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na kọleji na-ewe afọ isii ma nwee afọ atọ na Junior Secondary School wee soro afọ atọ na Senior Secondary School.  A na-enye klas n'asụsụ Bekee, asụsụ French, asụsụ Yoruba, na asụsụ Igbo
Senior Secondary School na-elekwasị anya na nkwadebe na ule atọ: West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE), na International General Certificate of Secondary Education (IGCSE)
Tụkwasị na nke a, a na-akwadebe ụmụ akwụkwọ maka ule nke Bekee dị ka asụsụ mba ọzọ (TOEFL) na SAT Reasoning Test (SAT).
